Class.name: LoginInput
Class.description: input pojo which describes all the required information of the user

property.name: userAccountId
property.description: user Account Id which is the email id of the user

property.name: password
property.description: password of the user who logins

Class.name: LoginResponse
Class.description: LoginResponse which describes the user is real or not

property.name: flag
property.description: flag that describes the type of user real or fake
